attributes.action: put  to get equipment to our troops in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for this Government to stand up in particular Mr Brown to get more suitable equipment especially helicopters to give our troops the required protection on the ground in Helmand Province. Surely the recent events and tragic losses must make our government realise that it is now time to act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
